item.title: Bally Station Hero: RPF Officer Saves Man from Suicide Attempt
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: RPF officer HC Surendra Kumar rescues man from suicide attempt at Bally station. A powerful reminder that suicide is not the answer—help is always near.

item.title: Vehicles Run on Bhopal Railway Station Platform: Major Security Lapse Caught on Camera
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Vehicles seen running on platforms at Bhopal Railway Station raise major safety concerns. Shocking videos go viral, prompting swift RPF investigation and public outrage.

item.title: World-Class Executive Lounge at Bhopal Junction Sets New Standards in Rail Travel
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Experience world-class comfort at Bhopal Junction’s Executive Lounge with 200 seats, VIP recliners, Wi-Fi, showers & more—luxury meets railway travel.

item.title: Indian Railways Unveils First 3D-Printed Building
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Indian Railways builds its first 3D-printed Gangman Hut in Andhra Pradesh in just 25 days. A major leap in sustainable infrastructure and rapid construction.

item.title: Heroic Rescue at Nagpur Railway Station: RPF Jawan Saves Young Woman from Near-Death
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Quick action by an RPF jawan at Nagpur railway station saved a young woman who slipped while boarding a moving train.

item.title: Indian Railways Fare Hike from July 1: What You Need to Know
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Indian Railways fare hike effective July 1, 2025: AC classes see 2 paise/km increase, sleeper fares up by 0.5 paise/km. Aadhaar now mandatory for Tatkal bookings. Full details on revised fare structure and exemptions.
